ygData.msgSnippet: Sky Knight looked on. Maybe, he replied to Blazer. But we have to make it clear not to kill whoever we send in there. He s used to killing anyone he s up

Sky Knight looked on. "Maybe," he replied to Blazer. "But we have to 
make it clear not to kill whoever we send in there. He's used to 
killing anyone he's up against." He turned his head. "Who wants to 
go?" He thought for a moment. "Well, on second thought maybe we 
should leave it be. If we needed him not to kill all his victims, we 
could try it some other time. He does understand stand down."

He pointed to the inside of the cell. "Want to go and get those 
drones out or leave them as chew toys for Beserk?" Techy elbowed him 
on the side.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Blazer::
> 
> The frist drone hits the wall, falling down and not moving, as 
sparks fly 
> from the second one's head.
> 
> Blazer chuckles, looking at the two piles of scrapp. "Well, I guess 
he did 
> fine," he says, "Should we try him on one of the group members?"
